articles.title: Nichelle Nichols of ‘Star Trek’ Showed America a Different Future - The New York Times
articles.description: As Lieutenant Uhura in “Star Trek” and an advocate for inclusiveness in the U.S. space program, Nichols made an indelible impact on our collective imagination.
articles.content:
